Package com.orientechnologies.orient.object.enhancement.field

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategy
    Strategy handling how to store and retrieve data in documents.
    ODocumentFieldOTypeHandlingStrategy
    Strategy handling how to store and retrieve data in documents.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ODocumentFieldHandler
    Wraps a ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategy to be accessed statically.
    The strategy to be used is set via OGlobalConfiguration.DOCUMENT_BINARY_MAPPING and the possible values are ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategyFactory.SIMPLE, ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategyFactory.SINGLE_ORECORD_BYTES or ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategyFactory.SPLIT_ORECORD_BYTES.
    ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategyFactory
    Factory for ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategy instances.
    ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategyRegistry
    ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategy registry.
    ODocumentSimpleFieldHandlingStrategy
    ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategy that delegates to the default ODocument.field(String) implementation.
    ODocumentSingleRecordBytesOTypeHandlingStrategy
    ODocumentFieldOTypeHandlingStrategy that stores each OType.BINARY object in a ORecordBytes.
    ODocumentSmartFieldHandlingStrategy
    ODocumentFieldHandlingStrategy that deals with fields (depending on their type) in a smarter way than a ODocumentSimpleFieldHandlingStrategy.
    ODocumentSplitRecordBytesOTypeHandlingStrategy
    ODocumentFieldOTypeHandlingStrategy that stores each OType.BINARY object split in several ORecordBytes.
